snippet.title: Lord of Dragons - Android Gameplay APK
snippet.description:
Lord of Dragons Global - Android Gameplay APK | NFT Game
Categories: Role Playing 
Languages: English 
Status: Early access - Beta Test + APK
Size: 2.93 GB
Internet: Online
Platform: Android 

Lord of Dragons is the blockbuster-level MMORPG, created by the team with over 20 years of experience, and published numerous game titles such as Dragon Raja, Dragonica, East Legends and many others. Players get to enjoy solid storylines, credible in-game balance while creative gaming mechanisms and system will provide an experience that has never been done before in mobile-environment.

Game has to be ‘fun to play’. Lord of Dragons is not just another P2E game that has no element of ‘fun’ and only focused about ‘Earning’. We strive to be the P2E MMORPG that our players would truly enjoy every aspects of the game while remaining in the ecosystem for longer period of time because they want to.. 

- Play multiple classes with a single character
- Maximum of 3 different weapon slots for variety of battle experience
- Party combination that can be adjusted in real-time
- Battle strategy based on attribution factors of each weapon
- Revamping dedicated weaponry skills through skill points acquired by levelling up
- 6 weapons have been introduced – up to 12 weapons will be available through future updates

Attribution Revamp Emphasized on Weapons & Skills
- Each weapon skill possesses 2 attributions
- Separate stats to make an emphasis on each skills
- Additional level up opportunity apart from skill levels

💡 APK https://lordofdragons.io/
💡 Discord Community: https://discord.com/invite/lordofdragons
 ==========================
✅ Website (More new content) - https://www.palmassgames.ru
✅ Play new games - https://clck.ru/yXjQg
======================================
Thanks for your views and likes!
Subscribe to the channel, it will motivate me to find more new content for you!
Many thanks!
#LordofDragons #LODNFT #p2e #nftgame 
#PalmassGames #Androidgames #Iosgames #AndroidApk #NewGames #AndroidGameplay
